English: He doesn't do bad even to flies., He's harmless, really nice.
Don't make a fly into a "härkänen"., Don't make a mountain out of a mole hill.

Finnish: Olisi ollut kiva olla kärpäsenä katossa tarkkailemassa.
English: It would have been nice to watch as a fly from the ceiling., I'd have liked to look in undetected.
Hungarian: Jó lett volna legyként a plafonról figyelni.

English: I have butterflies in my stomach., I'm excited / nervous.
